sentence.Network_cn: 对以前爱吃的食物，他兴许突然就没了胃口。

sentence.Network_en: Suddenly all the men pull out pistols and begin blasting away.
sentence.Network_cn: 突然，所有人都拔出手枪，连续射击。

encyclopedia.content: 基本信息 专辑：《Suddenly》 歌手： Allstar Weekend 语种： 欧美 流派： 摇滚乐 地区： 欧美 专辑介绍 Allstar Weekend锛埲餍侵苣╋級是以Zach为主唱， Nathan为吉他手兼主唱，Cameron为贝斯手，Michael为鼓手的一支Disney力捧的全新流行摇滚/朋克乐队。这些家伙的歌曲充满了时下的流行性：有旋律感，活力十足。 《Suddenly》是他们于2010年6月21日发行的首张专辑，制作人包括Howard Benson (The All-American Rejects)、SAM

entry.def: If something happens suddenly, it happens quickly and unexpectedly.

example.ex: Suddenly, she looked ten years older...
example.tran: 突然间她看起来老了 10 岁。

sentences.sentence: "suddenly she felt a sharp pain in her side"
"he decided to go to Chicago on the spur of the moment"

auth_sentence.content: When the end came, it came very suddenly.
auth_sentence.res_content: When the end came, it came very suddenly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When the end came, it came very suddenly.

auth_sentence.content: Suddenly, it was as if she was everywhere.
auth_sentence.res_content: Suddenly, it was as if she was everywhere.

Sentence.sentence: Meetings at resorts are suddenly unacceptable.
when nearly one-quarter of the workforce was unemployed, the divorce rate had declined by around 25% from 1929 But this doesn't mean people were suddenly happier with their marriages.
In 1920 he went to teach in New York and died there suddenly after only three weeks.
If scholars suddenly discovered that Rembrandt had dashed off "The Night Watch" in an afternoon, it would still be "The Night Watch.

sentences.en: Mary suddenly appeared in the doorway.
My heart suddenly began beating violently.
sentences.cn: 我的心突然开始猛烈地跳动。

sentences.en: My mind suddenly switched back to my conversation with Jeremy.
sentences.cn: 我的思绪突然回到了与杰里米的谈话上。

sentences.en: I suddenly remembered that I hadn’t locked the door.
sentences.cn: 我突然记起我没有锁门。
